caption.p: Optimization of different parameters for bioinspired synthesis of silver nanoparticles. UV-vis spectrum of AgNPs mediated by leaf aqueous extracts of Fagonia indica: (a) effect of AgNO 3 concertation, (b) effect of extract and AgNO 3 (1â€‰mM) ratios on the synthesis of green nanoparticles, (c) effect of temperature, and (d) duration of time for synthesis of silver nanoparticles at different time intervals.
